attributes.action: Royal navy to take over patrolling of the English Channel from border force
attributes.additional_details: Hand over security of the English Channel to the royal navy
attributes.background: The Royal navy should take over the patrolling and policing of uk waters as border force have shown utter incompetence in securing UK borders

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Deploy the Royal Navy to help stop illegal immigrants entering the UK - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701998
